title: China gets poetic after Trump's latest currency attack
text:
China gets poetic after Trump's latest currency attack 12:09pm EDT - 01:28 
China has said that information coming out of U.S. regarding the Chinese currency is ''a bit chaotic''. As Pascale Davies reports, it comes after President Trump accused China and Russia in a Twitter post of devaluing their currencies.   
China has said that information coming out of U.S. regarding the Chinese currency is "a bit chaotic". As Pascale Davies reports, it comes after President Trump accused China and Russia in a Twitter post of devaluing their currencies.  //reut.rs/2JR2XPw
